Title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
Description: A classic Bollywood romance about two young people who fall in love during a trip across Europe, defying the wishes of their traditional Indian parents.

Title: 3 Idiots
Description: A comedy-drama about the friendship of three engineering students at an Indian university and their struggles with societal pressures and the education system.

Title: Lagaan
Description: An epic sports drama set in colonial India where a group of villagers facing high taxes challenges the British rulers to a game of cricket.

Title: PK
Description: A satirical comedy-drama that explores the concept of religion and superstition in Indian society through the eyes of an alien stranded on Earth.

Title: Swades
Description: A drama about an Indian-American NASA scientist who returns to his homeland and rediscovers his roots while working on a project to bring electricity to a remote village.

Title: Taare Zameen Par
Description: A heartwarming drama about a dyslexic child and his struggles in school. It highlights the importance of understanding and nurturing individual talents and differences.

Title: Queen
Description: A comedy-drama about a young woman who goes on her honeymoon alone after her fianc√© calls off the wedding, and discovers herself in the process.

Title: Rang De Basanti
Description: A drama about a group of university students who are inspired by their friend's death to fight against corruption and injustice in Indian society.

Title: Robot
Description: A scientist creates a humanoid robot with artificial intelligence, but things take a turn when the robot falls in love with the scientist's girlfriend.
A sequel to Robot, where a new threat emerges in the form of destructive humanoid birds created by a disgruntled ornithologist.

Title: Border
Description: Based on the Battle of Longewala during the Indo-Pakistani War of 1971, this film showcases the bravery of Indian soldiers defending their post against Pakistani forces.

Title: Uri: The Surgical Strike
Description: Based on true events, this film depicts the 2016 surgical strikes conducted by the Indian Army against militant launch pads in Pakistani-administered Kashmir.

Title: The Ghazi Attack
Description: The film is based on the mysterious sinking of PNS Ghazi during the Indo-Pakistani War of 1971.

Title: Paltan
Description: The film depicts the events that led to the 1967 Nathu La and Cho La clashes along the Sikkim border after the 1962 Sino-Indian War.

Title: Kesari
Description: Based on the Battle of Saragarhi, the film tells the story of Havildar Ishar Singh who participated in the battle against 10,000 Afghan invaders.
